arts.ttl: Real Madrid climb up to second in LaLiga after seeing off Sevilla
arts.sum: Los Blancos sit one point behind leaders Atletico Madrid and two points clear of third-placed Barcelona, who have played one more game.

arts.ttl: ‘Never seen anything like it’ – Jesús Navas sends thank you message to Real Madrid fans
arts.sum: Spanish football icon Jesús Navas has on Sunday evening moved to reveal his appreciation for both Real Madrid as a club, and the Blancos faithful. This comes after the 39-year-old…

arts.ttl: ‘Rodri saved football’ – Brother of Barcelona star takes aim at Real Madrid’s Vinícius Jr.
arts.sum: The brother of Barcelona star Dani Olmo has on Sunday evening turned heads online. This comes owing to a post on Instagram, in which he aimed a blatant jibe at…

arts.ttl: Villarreal star overtakes Jude Bellingham in La Liga charts
arts.sum: A head-turning statistic, highlighting the impressive debut campaign being enjoyed by Villarreal star Thierno Barry, has this evening come to the fore online. This comes fresh off an outing to…

arts.ttl: Vinícius Jr. responds to Kylian Mbappé’s brilliance for Real Madrid vs Sevilla
arts.sum: Real Madrid star Vinícius Jr. has this evening made known his appreciation for the latest efforts of teammate Kylian Mbappé. This, of course, comes after an outing to remember for…

arts.ttl: Carlo Ancelotti: “It is difficult to match a year like this one, but we will try”
arts.sum: He was asked about Real Madrid’s 2024, as well as what they will try to do in 2025, to which he said: “It’s very difficult to match a year like this one. Carlo Ancelotti spoke to the media after Real Madrid ’s 4-2 win over Sevilla to end their 2024 on a high.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid & Chelsea eyeing move for Las Palmas talent
arts.sum: La Liga giants Real Madrid have been joined in the hunt for Las Palmas talent Dário Essugo by one of the leading clubs in the Premier League. That’s according to…

arts.ttl: European football: Mbappé on target as Real Madrid climb up to second in La Liga
arts.sum: French striker scores and assists in 4-2 win over Sevilla Dybala scores twice in Roma’s 5-0 win against Parma Real Madrid forward Kylian Mbappé netted the opener and set up another goal as the hosts beat mid-table Sevilla 4-2 on Sunday to move up to second place in La Liga and close the gap on Atlético Madrid to one point going into the winter break. Mbappé scored with a thunderbolt from outside the box in the 10th minute before Federico Valverde put reigning champions Real two goals ahead from long-range 10 minutes later. Rodrygo fired home the third in the 34th from a cross by Lucas Vazquez. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Mbappé scores again as Real Madrid ends 2024 in 2nd place in Spanish league
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappé added to his scoring streak with a superb strike 10 minutes into a Spanish league match as Real Madrid beat Sevilla 4-2 on Sunday to finish the year one point behind leader Atletico Madrid. Third-place Barcelona is two points behind Madrid, having played an extra game.

arts.ttl: Mbappé stars as Madrid earn 4-2 win vs. Sevilla
arts.sum: Real Madrid forward Kylian Mbappe netted the opener and set up another goal as the hosts beat mid-table Sevilla 4-2 on Sunday
